sub_topic: Calculating the electronegativity difference between two atoms
message_1: What is the electronegativity difference between a carbon atom (2.55) and an oxygen atom (3.44) in the compound CO2?
message_2: The electronegativity difference between a carbon atom (2.55) and an oxygen atom (3.44) in the compound CO2 is 3.44 - 2.55 = 0.89.
